title: Jackie 'O' Henderson is left shocked at The Masked Singer Photoshop fail
text:
Jackie 'O' Henderson was shocked to discover a promotional poster for The Masked Singer Australia had been poorly Photoshopped.

During a segment on The Kyle and Jackie O Show, the 44-year-old revealed her right hand had been digitally replaced by that of a professional hand model.

Expressing her shock, she said: 'Oh my God! They've used a hand model and replaced my hands!'

'They've replaced them!' Jackie 'O' Henderson (pictured) was shocked to discover a promotional poster for The Masked Singer Australia had been poorly Photoshopped

Jackie's co-host Kyle Sandilands saw the funny side, saying: 'They must have been sitting around [at] Channel 10 publicity and gone, "What disgusting hands she has!"'

The poster was then brought into KIIS FM's studio, and Jackie placed her hands over it to demonstrate how different they look in real life.

In a bizarre twist, a listener then called in and told Jackie that she was her hand model during a Ford commercial from the mid 2000s.

Spot the difference! During a segment on The Kyle and Jackie O Show, the 44-year-old revealed her right hand had been digitally replaced by that of a professional hand model

Ouch! Jackie's co-host Kyle Sandilands (pictured) joked that her hands were too 'ugly'

A stunned Jackie revealed she had no idea the close-up shots of her hands in the Ford commercial had been re-filmed without her knowledge.

Jackie appears on The Masked Singer Australia alongside fellow judges Dannii Minogue, Lindsay Lohan and Dave Hughes.

On Monday, she told TV Week that she struggled being away from her eight-year-old daughter Kitty while filming the show earlier this year.

That's awkward! In a bizarre twist, a listener called in and told Jackie that she was her hand model during a Ford commercial from the mid 2000s. Jackie said she had no idea the close-up shots of her hands in the Ford commercial (above) had been re-filmed without her knowledge

'In the lead-up, I was really quite stressed about how I was going to physically do that [filming The Masked Singer and presenting for KIIS],' she said.

'I think in the end I was just running on adrenaline. But because we were having so much fun, I didn't mind.'

The Masked Singer continues Tuesday at 7:30pm on Channel 10
description: Jackie 'O' Henderson was shocked to discover a promotional poster for The Masked Singer Australia had been poorly Photoshopped.
authors: Chloe-Lee Longhetti For Daily Mail Australia
